text: The Alexander PS was a single-decker body of a bus. It had a step-entrance. It was made from 1988 to 1998 by Walter Alexander Coachbuilders. The Alexander PS type body could be built on the Dennis Lance chassis, Leyland Lynx chassis, Mercedes-Benz O405 chassis, Scania N113 chassis, Volvo B10M chassis and the Iveco Turbocity chassis. ==Related pages== * List of buses ==References== ==Other websites== * PS type Category:Step-entrance buses
title: Alexander PS type
